TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRowView extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor, class System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo, class System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class DataRowView Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor, IDataErrorInfo, IEditableObject, INotifyPropertyChanged

public ref class DataRowView : System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor, System::ComponentModel::IDataErrorInfo, System::ComponentModel::IEditableObject, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示 的自定义视图。

span.span: Represents a customized view of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当数据是显示，例如，在可以显示控件，每个行只有一个版本。Whenever data is displayed, such as in a control, only one version of each row can be displayed. 显示的行是。The displayed row is a . A可以具有四个不同的版本状态之一： `Default`， `Original`， `Current`，和`Proposed`。A can have one of four different version states: `Default`, `Original`, `Current`, and `Proposed`. 之后调用上，任何已编辑的值将成为`Proposed`值。After invoking on a , any edited value becomes the `Proposed` value. 直到或是调用，该行有`Original`和`Proposed`版本。Until either or is invoked, the row has an `Original` and a `Proposed` version. 如果是调用，建议的版本将被丢弃，并且值会恢复为`Original`。If is invoked, the proposed version is discarded, and the value reverts to `Original`. 如果调用时，不再具有`Proposed`版本; 相反，建议的值将成为的当前值。If is invoked, the no longer has a `Proposed` version; instead, the proposed value becomes the current value. 默认值为仅在具有定义的默认值的列的行上可用。Default values are available only on rows that have columns with default values defined. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来确定在行的状态。The following example uses the property to determine the state of a row in the . (请参阅另一个示例使用。)(See for another example using .) [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型是安全的多线程读取操作。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 你必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 开始编辑过程。

span.span: Begins an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用添加。Use to add a . 方法等同于方法。The method is identical to the method of the . 在调用，对所做任何更改通过调用可以回滚。After calling , any changes made to the can be rolled back by calling . 调用方法，然后再允许用户更改行值。Call the method before allowing users to change row values. 通过设置值已更改后，检索新值到`DataRowVersion.Proposed`。After values have been changed, you retrieve the new values by setting the to `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 检查与业务规则，值和回滚所做的更改，如果需要通过调用，或调用接受这些更改。Check the values with a business rule, and roll back the changes if needed by calling , or call to accept the changes. ## Examples 下面的示例中编辑行。The following example edits a row in a . 调用之前，和之后。calling the before, and afterwards. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消编辑过程。

span.span: Cancels an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用，将回滚所有更改的行。After calling , all changes to the row are rolled back. 你还可以回滚更改通过调用对父。You can also roll back changes by calling on the parent . ## Examples 下面的示例中编辑行。The following example edits a row in a . 调用方法可取消更改，如果验证失败。The method is called to cancel the changes if the validation fails. remarks.format: ## Remarks 才会永久删除行上调用时所属行。The row is not permanently deleted until is invoked on the that the row belongs to. > [!NOTE] > A时可能无效`DataRow`从基础表中删除。A may be invalid when a `DataRow` is deleted from the underlying table. 当将变为无效，访问相关联的值的操作，如，引发异常。When the becomes invalid, operations that access values associated with , such as , throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用行上的方法。The following example uses the method on a row.
